snippet: To explain the unsatisfying results at Target, executives pointed to continued difficulty in the company’s rollout in Canada.
abstract: Disparate batch of retail companies release lackluster earnings results, accompanied by significantly lowered forecast from Target and more store closings from Staples.
lead_paragraph: To explain the unsatisfying results at Target, executives pointed to continued difficulty in the company’s rollout in Canada.

headline.main: Earnings at Target Disappoint; Lowe’s Cuts Sales Outlook
headline.print_headline: Profit Dives at Target; Lowe’s Cuts Its Outlook
